title: Learn about the interpretation of rain in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A large number of commentators agreed with the interpretation of rain in a dream that it is a good coming for the dreamer and a good situation in general, and today, through one of the Egyptian websites, we will discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail for both single and married women, pregnant women and divorced women. Interpretation of rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of rain in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rain is evidence of the near satisfaction that It will come to the dreamer's life and his financial situation will improve a lot, so whoever suffered from a financial crisis, the dream tells him that he will obtain a new source of livelihood. And the debts will be paid on this basis. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the rain that falls from the sky is a sign of purity from all sins and a return to the path of God Almighty. As for whoever has a loved one who has been lost for a long time in a dream, this is a good omen that this person will return to him soon. The dream also symbolizes gaining a new source of livelihood and there will be a significant and noticeable increase in livelihood.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, ' params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');As for a person who suffers from the instability of worldly affairs, in a dream of rain falling from the sky, it is fortunate that life will become very stable, and that he will be able to Achieving his various goals soon, even if it is his life. The road becomes impossible at this time, and the urgent thing is to approach God Almighty for the forgiveness of all sins. Interpretation of rain in a dream by Ibn SirinThe venerable scholar Ibn Sirin explained that rain falling in the dream of the afflicted and miserable is evidence of the health of the situation in addition to the sustenance and goodness that comes in the dreamer’s life. A person who sees rainwater filling his house is a sign that he will suffer serious damage at work, so he will have to look for a new job. It is also a common interpretation that the dreamer will move to a new house, whatever it may be. He suffers from family problems, then in the dream there is happy news that all his affairs will be settled and all disputes and problems will end in the coming period.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' ' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');As for someone who sees in his dream that the sky is raining stones and other heavy things on him, this is a sign of disruption to the dreamer’s journey and the things he planned for a period of time. The dreamer has sufficient strength and ability to enable the dreamer to face difficulties, but whoever dreams that rain falls on his head and is in pain because of it, shows that he has completely lost confidence in his life as a result of the circumstances. Going through disappointment

title: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for my brother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my brother involved in a car accident in a dream We will explain what scholars have established regarding the interpretation of a dream of a car accident for my brother in a dream and what it means, good or bad, and other details about you.Interpretation of a dream of a car accident for my brother in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a car accident for my brother in a dream can be A sign of problems between them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as He can express the problems with the brother and must solve them, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a car accident with her brother in a dream, this may be evidence of his need for help, and God knows the unseen. A young man’s vision of a car accident may also express his brother’s About the brother’s need for help, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and speaking testimony in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and pronouncing testimony in a dream can lead to relief after fatigue, and God knows best. When a married man sees a traffic accident and reads the testimony, this can lead to solace, and God knows the unseen. If A young man dreaming that he is pronouncing the Shahada after an accident, this may indicate the consolation of the dreamer, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing him pronouncing the Shahada can indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a car colliding with a wall in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car colliding with a wall in a dream. We did not find clear concepts for seeing this. However, seeing a car accident in a dream could be a sign of disagreements, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a car accident, this can indicate rivalries and conflicts, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a married man witnesses a car accident, it may lead to Trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about saving a child from a car accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about saving a child from a car accident in a dream may indicate someone who will help him solve problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees saving a child, he can turn to someone who will help him solve financial crises, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a young man. He saves a child from a car accident, which can lead to saving some projects from failure, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of a car accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for my husband in a dream. A woman’s vision of a car accident can express problems and difficulties, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees a car accident, it can It leads to problems with her husband, and God knows the unseen. When a woman sees a simple traffic accident, it may be a sign of stress, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone committing an accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone committing an accident in a dream could be evidence of bad news heard by the person who caused the accident, and God knows the unseen. Vision. A person who has been in an accident can express his need for help, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a car accident with someone she knows, this may be evidence of his need for help, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car accident involving a stranger in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car accident involving someone A stranger in a dream could be a warning sign of conflicts, and God knows the unseen, as it may represent people who want to harm the dreamer, and God knows the unseen, when a married man sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a donkey in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of riding a donkey in a dream shows fame, respect, and other interpretations, and we will interpret this for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, as riding a white woman. Or a black donkey, or riding a horse on a gray donkey, or riding a cart drawn by a donkey, or I dreamed that I was riding a donkey on the road according to Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of riding a donkey in a dream Meaning: I am riding a donkey in a dream As for the high status of the dreamer, as for the girl who sees In her dream, it is as if she is riding on the back of a donkey, then she is marrying a capable man. And whoever sees in a dream that he is riding a donkey and walking with it in the markets and in the alleys, he will become famous and his fame will rise among the people. Riding a colt or a donkey is better in interpretation than riding a mare or riding a horse, and all of these animals Cattle are better to ride in a dream. The reason they prefer riding ponies and donkeys is that most of the prophets and messengers were riding these animals. The main narrative texts state that Christ entered Jerusalem riding a colt, as well as in the case of the Prophet Solomon. Whoever rides a donkey in a dream and enters a city or village with it, will become its master. Whoever sees that a donkey stumbles while walking or walks with difficulty, then he will face many problems in his life. Whoever dreams that he beats his donkey with whips, then he is committing a sin, sinning, or oppressing someone. Like a donkey in a dream, like a mule, a camel, and a horse, then riding it is good, It indicates the achievement of desires and goals after toil and patience, and perhaps toil and suffering. The donkey, in general, symbolizes the enjoyment of the world and its adornments, which include money, children, and many blessings. Whoever rides on a donkey until he sees it, will enter the house with him. His livelihood is given from where it is not calculated. Riding a donkey also indicates victory, triumph, safety, security, and freedom from distress, anxiety, and sorrow.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If you dream that you are riding a donkey, it means that you will achieve success slowly but surely, and therefore you should not make important decisions rashly, and always seek expert advice on... Things that you do not understand. Riding a donkey in your dream means that you know that you have chosen the most difficult path, but you have armed yourself with patience at the right time and believe that the time of success is coming. Riding a donkey in a dream means that you will convince those around you or your colleagues to work for common goals, but It may be difficult for you to convince them at first and you will have to prove to them that this work will benefit them before you get their help and you have to prove it, let them know that these goals are the same as yours and theirs at the same time.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'wid

title: Interpretation of milk in a dream: Seeing milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about milk indicates good character, a great livelihood, and other interpretations we will interpret for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as cooked milk and curdled milk. Or yogurt according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of milk in a dream. Seeing milk in a dream, which generally refers to religion, Islam, and the correct instinct that the dreamer has, especially if the dreamer drinks milk. They also say that milk is money, profit, kindness, and blessing that he obtains. On it the dreamer in real life. The most important thing that distinguishes this money is that it is permissible and free from doubt or prohibition. Dairy products and milk in a dream. Most cases are abundance, money, sustenance, goodness, and blessings that the dreamer obtains in wakefulness and real life. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin said: Seeing milk or milk in a dream is a good omen, as it indicates A life full of health, blessings, and good deeds. It also indicates that whoever sees it (the dreamer) will acquire good deeds. The result of a good deed he does.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in a dream that he is drinking mare’s milk, this indicates the love of the sultan or ruler for him and the acquisition of good things and money from him, and there is another interpretation for that. . In the same vision, Al-Nabulsi drinking horse milk means that the king or ruler will love him and receive money from him, or that this person will meet the Sultan and greet him by chance. If one sees the milk in a dream as dirty or moldy, this may mean that friends and company are far from him, and his positions are linked to his enemies, The loss of his money, and the lack of blessings in him. Rizk. As for seeing curd or milk in a dream, this means that this person will fall into a trap and conspiracy designed and invented by his enemies. And if someone sees that he refuses to drink milk in a dream and drinks honey or wine, for example.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', ' format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');As for seeing hot and warm milk in a dream, this means for a man stability in his work and livelihood, but for a woman it is reward and forgiveness from God Almighty, and for a pregnant woman it is a sign of the end of hardship and the coming Easy, God willing. . Ready. If someone sees in a dream that he is bathing and bathing with milk, then this is a sign of goodness coming to him, joy in his heart, abundance of his money, people’s love for him, and purity of his heart. And the purity of his soul. And whoever sees donkey’s milk in a dream, he will suffer pain

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for chocolate in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person asking for chocolate in a dream. In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about a deceased person asking for chocolate in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some diligent scholars who seek to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for chocolate in A dream: Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person was asking for chocolate in a dream may indicate changes that may occur to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Asking the deceased about chocolate in a dream may indicate his need for zakat and supplication at this time, and God knows best. And it is possible that it is Seeing a dead person giving chocolate in a dream is an indication of the good and ample livelihood that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of stealing chocolate in a dream Stealing chocolate in a dream may indicate some obstacles and obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during that period If a person sees himself stealing chocolate, this may indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing chocolate stolen in a dream indicates distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this period. Seeing stealing chocolate in a dream and eating it may indicate the dreamer’s illegitimate gains and he must repent to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of distributing chocolate in a dream: A dream of distributing chocolate in a dream may indicate the good life that the dreamer enjoys a lot during this time. It is possible that the vision of distributing chocolate in a dream is Chocolate in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period. Seeing the distribution of chocolate in a dream may indicate that things and circumstances will become much easier for the dreamer. We may find that distributing chocolate in a dream is a sign of goodness and the ability to achieve desires and dreams, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate with coconut in a dream: Seeing chocolate with coconut in a dream may indicate the joys that may befall the dreamer during this time. If one sees chocolate with coconut, this may indicate success and success in life during that period, thanks to God. Whoever sees it in his dream That the chocolate was coconut could indicate that desires and dreams were largely fulfilled during that period. If one sees coconut chocolate and eats it, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrows from the life of the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person Offering chocolates in a dream: In the event that a person sees that the deceased was offering chocolates, this may indicate good news that will come to insight in those days, thanks to God. If you see the deceased offering chocolates in a dream, this may be a sign of your need for alms and prayers for him during This time. If the deceased is seen giving chocolate in a dream, it may indicate good circumstances for the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased gave

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead end or seeing a dead end in a dream

preview.html: A dead end in a dream indicates that you are facing temporary problems and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, or man, such as walking on a closed road, opening a dead end or searching for a road according to Ibn Sirin and others on: Interpretation of an impasse in a dream A road or a dead end In a dream, it is an expression of the obstruction of vision and the cessation of hope after the viewer is exposed to an emotional shock or something else. This is a temporary psychological state that does not in any way indicate a blockage of the horizon in the real future, but the viewer must work harder to overcome any experience that may stand in his way. Dreaming of a dead end indicates your deep-rooted desires and desire to experience freedom and adventure. title: The 15 most important meanings of a bra in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream indicates a close relationship, collecting money, and other meanings, and we will mention them for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men like you. See the new bra or bra by Ibn Sirin and more. Continuation of the topic: Seeing a bra in a dream. A dream about a bra can indicate that the viewer is in love in his personal life, and this dream can represent a warning about bad emotional relationships. And when you dream of seeing a bra, It may mean that you are not satisfied with the love life that you are living and you may feel that the relationship is not as good as it was in the beginning and that things are getting colder because of each other’s routine. If this is true, then you should sit down and talk frankly with your lover. Moreover, it will be beneficial to have You have a new solution to improve your relationship with him. A dream about a bra can be evidence of success in financial affairs or work, and when you dream of seeing a bra, this indicates your desire to experience new adventures, in addition to this vision shows that you need to take care of your condition. Health. If you see a bra in a dream, and you go through an emotional affair or a failed relationship, then compensation will come to you, God willing, with a better, more suitable and comfortable relationship for you. If you dream that your bra is cut off, this indicates a separation between you and someone close to you. If you dream that the size of your bra It has become larger, has a beautiful shape, and is fit, then this is evidence of good circumstances, marriage, and a good financial situation, God willing. But if you dream that your bra has become large, but its shape is not beautiful, then this is evidence of fears, poverty, and a financial crisis that will strike your life. If you dream that someone gave you a bra This means that you will soon benefit from this person or another. If you are married and a bra appears in the dream, this means that you will get money, but with a lot of trouble, problems, and fatigue. This vision also indicates that you will consult the person of opinion and wisdom about a problem and he will save you from it, God willing. If you You dream that you took off your bra, this means that something not benign will happen. If you dream that you bought a new bra, this means that you will get the opinion of a wise person on the issue of your life. And whoever sees in a dream that she took off her clothes and took off her bra and exposed her breasts, or she saw that her breasts are naked in a dream in front of A group of people and people look at her breasts, it falls into a scandal. Or he will follow a path with many forbidden things, or she will become friends and accompany colleagues to college or university, robbing her of her honor. It was said that whoever saw this vision when she was young has not done so yet. She has reached the age of marriage, perhaps this indicates her death. A bra in a married woman’s dream indicates pregnancy. Seeing a single girl’s bra shows a lot about the lifestyle and appearance of the person you like very much. To read a detailed interpretation of the meaning of a bra in a dream for a single woman, from the link >> Interpretation of a bra in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a bra in a dream by Ibn Sirin, reported by the interpreter of Ahla

title: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband’s brother, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband’s brother. In the world of dreams, there are many signs and indications that indicate that if the dreamer sees her, he is overcome by feelings of anxiety and confusion and wishes to know the interpretations of the vision and the good or evil it brings. Jurists have interpreted the evidence of this dream and its effects in changing some matters in the dreamer’s life, which we will shed light on in the following lines.Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husband’s brotherInterpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to her husband’s brotherThere are many different interpretations related to seeing a married woman marrying her husband’s brother. It is a good sign of some positive changes in her life, or a bad sign that she will be exposed to problems and crises. The occurrence of quarrels with her husband in reality and the lack of peace of mind and great stability. However, if the dreamer separates from her husband as a result of many disagreements between them, then the dream of marrying her husband’s brother is considered promising evidence of reconciliation and the return of things to normal again after a period of worries and unhappiness, as was said. This vision benefits the one who sees it in a dream, corrects his condition and gets rid of his judgments that cause him distress and suffering.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300 , 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretations of the vision of a woman married to her husband’s brother many details and elements that lead to a difference in the content of the vision Which means that her feeling sad in a dream is evidence of her seriousness. The husband’s life-threatening health condition, and this has negatively affected her life, making her full of sadness and fear of separation. If she is happy, this means that she will hear good news soon. If the dreamer is suffering from problems and disagreements with her husband in reality, then the dream is considered evidence. On her fear of the future and the negative changes that will occur in it, as a result of her increasing size. The disagreement between them may lead to divorce, God forbid, as he completed his interpretations by saying that the vision may be a sign of the woman thinking a lot about her husband’s brother, taking into consideration her brother and her desire to see him happy and pleased. With a good girl who provides him with a quiet and stable life. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman marrying her husband’s brother: If the married woman wants to become pregnant in reality, then seeing her husband’s brother in a dream proves that her pregnancy is imminent, God willing, but if she is already pregnant, the meanings of the vision change to show that. She will give birth to a male child, and he will often have many of the characteristics of his uncle, as he has kindness and good morals, which is what a mother desires for her children.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width': 300,

title: Interpretation of a dream about hairdressing in a salon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about hairdressing in a hairdressing salon in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about hairdressing in a hairdressing salon in a dream, and it is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must be forbidden and not fully believe, because The jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth. He can make mistakes and he can be right, besides the site and its managers have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about hairdressing in the salon in a dream Combing hair in the salon in a dream may indicate gifts that will come to the dreamer often in the coming days. In the event that the woman sees That she is combing her hair in the salon, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the visionary in his life during this period. A dream about styling hair in a hairdresser in a dream may indicate that a difficult period has been overcome in the life of the person who had the vision in those days, and God knows best. And it is It is possible that seeing a hairdresser in a salon in a dream indicates success in professional life at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about combing and braiding hair in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he was combing and braiding his hair indicates the happiness that a man can achieve during that period. Dreaming of combing and braiding hair in a dream may indicate a desire to achieve goals and aspirations greatly during these days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing yourself combing and braiding hair in a dream indicates good changes that may occur in the dreamer’s life during these days, and God knows best. Dreaming of combing and braiding hair may indicate good events that will happen to the dreamer in his life at that time and he will be free from controversy, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about ironing hair in a dream Seeing ironed hair in a dream may mean that you will enjoy a decent life in those days, thanks to God. The dream of a person Straightening his hair with an iron may indicate important changes in his psychological and emotional state during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing ironed hair in a dream indicates the financial and family stability that the dreamer enjoys during those days. In the event that one sees that it is ironed His hair, this may indicate positive changes that may occur in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair with a golden comb in a dream. Combing hair with a golden comb in a dream could indicate a promotion at work or reaching a high position, thanks to God. If one sees Himself combing his hair with a golden comb, this may indicate an improvement in material and social conditions, thanks to God. In the case of seeing hair combed with a golden comb in a dream, it may indicate the ability to achieve goals and aspirations greatly during this period, and God knows best. Dreaming of combing hair with a golden comb It may indicate a good opportunity that will come to the dreamer, and he must take advantage of it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to comb hair in a dream. If a person is unable to comb his hair in a dream, this may be an indication of complications that may arise for the dreamer.

title: Interpretation of deafness, deafness and hearing loss in a dream

preview.html: Seeing deafness in a dream means poor judgment of things, poor management, and other interpretations, and we will explain this to an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as seeing a deaf person, or the child of someone who cannot hear, a deaf person, a deaf young man, a deaf girl, Either my husband, who cannot hear, is deaf, disabled, and has poor hearing. Ibn Sirin and others in: Interpretation of deafness in a dreamDeafness in a dream is a corruption of religion, but this expression or interpretation is only valid if the deafness is in someone other than someone who sees it, such as a friend, neighbor, or relative. If the dreamer sees that he is deaf, this is his interpretation of the inability to understand things. Or a bad assessment of situations and respect for people. A deaf person, like a blind person, is a person lost in a sea of ​​worries or problems. Deafness differs in interpretation between women and men because deafness in women deserves praise. If a woman sees an unmarried girl who sees in her dream as if she suddenly lost her sense of hearing, then in Reality distances itself from those who have a small soul or a sick heart. The deaf person whom the girl sees in her dream is not a person who has lost the sense of hearing (deaf), but rather one who has little luck in various matters. Deafness can refer to a stubborn or stubborn person in his life or he can It refers to a stupid or clumsy person. The deaf person in a girl’s dream is a man who has no religion or has no will, and every defect in the ear or sense of hearing is a defect in the mind or heart. It is not worth dreaming to see a girl marrying a deaf man, because this is interpreted as problems or worries. And the child. Being deaf in visions is praiseworthy because it portends happy news or news in the near future. If a married woman sees that she does not hear people’s words and does not distinguish the sounds of animals or things, then she is safe from evil, evil and hostility. If she sees that deafness or deafness has affected her husband, which means In the dream, she felt as if the husband did not understand what she was saying. This is a good interpretation if the husband did not appear nervous or violent as a result of hearing loss. The meaning of the dream is that the woman is able to manage the affairs of her home with confidence, determination, and strength. Perhaps the dream indicates compatibility and harmony between them, and perhaps deafness indicates The husband’s faith if the deafness is accompanied by silence or an absolute inability to speak. It indicates the end of pain or pain, and perhaps the dream indicates the disappearance of distress, anguish, and sadness if deafness or mutism is among children. The deaf boy and the mute girl have a good interpretation, both are safe, sound, and secure in health. And living and life in general. Optimism should also be given to deaf people because it indicates protection and keeping secrets. Perhaps the dream promises the woman a happy event after giving birth, God willing. If a man sees in a dream that he is deaf or mute, this is his interpretation of a weak will and inability to do an important matter, and deafness. If he sees it The dreamer, this indicates a fraudster or an outlaw and a religious person. He is not to be praised in the dream if the deaf or mute person is close or well-known. The best thing about seeing a deaf or mute person is that he is not a relative or a stranger, because the dream in this context indicates the dreamer’s safety and security, so decide vigilantly that
